markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Open](/Traits.aspx?ID=123)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

These maneuvers work only as the first salvo on your turn. You can use an open only if you haven't used an action with the [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15) or open trait yet this turn.
name: Open
